extraContent.title: Fusion Skills
extraContent.content:
Fusion Skills are passive attacks that trigger whenever you combine your attack with Mir's attack. Additionally, Mir's Skills and Fusion Attacks are not affected by Attack Speed increases and will not trigger Damage Reflect.

For skills that combine with Mir's, if you cast Mana Burst before the skill or cast the skill while lying down (holding the Down Arrow Key), the MP cost will be multiplied and cost more MP

Below is a list of skills that will trigger Fusion Skills:

  • Dragon Flash (2nd Job)
    • Wind Circle (2nd Job) = Wind Slash (2nd Job)
    • Thunder Circle (3rd Job) = Thunder Flash (3rd Job)
    • Return! effect: Return Flash (2nd Job)
  • Dragon Dive (3rd Job)
    • Thunder Circle (3rd Job) = Thunder Dive (3rd Job)
    • Earth Circle (4th Job) = Earth Dive (4th Job)
    • Return! effect: Return Dive (3rd Job)
  • Dragon Breath (4th Job)
    • Earth Circle (2nd Job) = Wind Breath (4th Job)
    • Earth Circle (4th Job) = Earth Breath (4th Job)
    • Return! effect: Return Flame (4th Job)
  • Dragon Slam (5th Job)
    • Elemental Barrage (5th Job) = Wyrmking's Breath (5th Job)
    • Return! effect: Ludicrous Speed (5th Job)
